thread.title: Carol I.
thread.title_full: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® reviewed by Carol I.

author: Carol I.
title: Carol I.
text: After I placed the orders, the design proofs came fast. I placed the order and buttons arrived as expected shortly thereafter. Apparently I estimated the price incorrectly and the cost was lower in the Quote: . Simple, easy, fast and very professional . What more do you want?
